typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		actors as (name as string)[],
		availabilityDate as string,
		genre as string,
		rating as string,
		releaseYear as string,
		runtime as string,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as string,
		tier as string,
		title as string,
		id as string,
		{_rid} as string,
		{_self} as string,
		{_etag} as string,
		{_attachments} as string,
		{_ts} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SothridgeDataCatlog
SothridgeDataCatlog derive(SourceSystemID = 1,
		GlobalMovieID = uuid(),
		SourceSystemMovieID = id,
		SouthridgeMovieID = id,
		Actor = @(Actorname=actors[1].name),
		ActorGender = 'NA',
		Title = title) ~> SRCatalog
SRCatalog select(mapColumn(
		availabilityDate,
		genre,
		rating,
		releaseYear,
		runtime,
		streamingAvailabilityDate,
		tier,
		title = SothridgeDataCatlog@title,
		id,
		{_rid},
		{_self},
		{_etag},
		{_attachments},
		{_ts},
		SourceSystemID,
		GlobalMovieID,
		SourceSystemMovieID,
		SouthridgeMovieID,
		ActorName = Actor,
		ActorGender
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
